detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: With over 200 years of collective legal experience, Habbas & Associates brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to every case. Their award-winning attorneys are recognized for their commitment to achieving the best possible outcomes.

detailsData.title: Client Satisfaction
detailsData.content: Habbas & Associates prides itself on the high level of satisfaction expressed by their clients. Their dedication to understanding and meeting the needs of their clients sets them apart from the competition.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: Offering a wide range of legal services, from personal injury to employment law, Habbas & Associates is equipped to handle a variety of cases, ensuring that clients receive the specialized attention they deserve.

detailsData.title: No Fee Promise
detailsData.content: Understanding the financial pressures their clients may face, Habbas & Associates offers a no-fee promise, meaning clients don’t pay unless their case is won. This commitment to affordability and justice is a cornerstone of their practice.

address: 675 N 1st Street, Suite 1000, San Jose, CA 95112
valueProp: Accidents happen, but a serious personal injury can change your life. At Habbas & Associates, our goal is simple: to provide the legal guidance our clients need and deserve. As personal injury lawyers in San Jose, we can help you pursue money for your accident, including compensation for medical bills, missed wages, hospitalization costs, and more. Creating an effective personal injury case isn’t easy, but with the help of our skilled legal team, you stand a better chance of obtaining the case outcome you need.

testimonalData.text: He answered all of our questions every time we had one and that's why we are so happy and blessed to have Habbas and Associates on our side. I strongly recommend them.
testimonalData.author: Feliciano & Maria Verzosa

testimonalData.text: The experience I had with Laura was exceptional and will 100% refer her and Habbas to anyone seeking an attorney for an accident. She made the experience a great one.
testimonalData.author: Juan A.

testimonalData.text: We are extremely happy with the seamless experience that they provided. All in all, you'd wish you never have to run into any injury situations but if you do then Habbas law firm is the place to go.
testimonalData.author: Neil T.
